articles.title: Wen Jiabao Wishes WPK Conference Success
articles.content:
Wen Jiabao Wishes WPK Conference Success 
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador to China Choe Pyong Gwan paid a courtesy call on Premier of the State Council of China Wen Jiabao on August 31.
					 The premier said at the meeting that the upcoming conference of the Workers' Party of Korea would mark a political event of great significance for the party, the state and the people of the DPRK, sincerely wishing the conference success.
					
					The China visit paid by General Secretary Kim Jong Il nearly four months since his visit in last May patently shows the stand of the party and the government of the DPRK to steadily develop the Sino-DPRK friendly relations and his two China visits this year provide an important occasion in boosting the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation, he noted.
					
					 Recalling that he had an in-depth exchange of view on the cooperation in economy and trade between the two countries, when meeting Kim Jong Il in Beijing in May this year, the premier expressed his intention to boost it in line with the spirit of the agreement made by the top leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: Pyongyang City Meeting of Delegates of WPK Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang City Meeting of Delegates of WPK Held
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting of delegates of Pyongyang of the Workers' Party of Korea for the election of delegates to the WPK conference took place at the People's Palace of Culture on August 28, according to Rodong Sinmun Thursday.
					 The meeting was attended by delegates elected by city and district party organizations, party organizations of units at different levels and party organizations of national institutions and city organs.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issue of electing delegates to the conference of the WPK. 
					
					 Myong Son Yong, secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK who is a delegate of the party organization of Central District of Pyongyang, said in his speech proposing the election of leader Kim Jong Il as a delegate to the conference that he converted the country whose people were reduced to members of a stateless nation due to its weak army a century ago into a socialist military power which no enemy dares provoke and provided a strong military guarantee for the prosperity of the generations to come. His exploits would shine forever in the history of the country, Myong added.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il created a heroic epic of patriotic devotion by visiting every nook and corner of the country with his iron will and inexhaustible enthusiasm to enable the Korean people to appear in the world, their chests thrown out, making sure that a gun salute was fired to herald the start of the building of a thriving nation during the Arduous March, the forced march.
					
					 Kim Jong Il unrolled a series of bold and big operations to further spruce up Pyongyang and improve the standard of people's living and took benevolent measurers one after another in recent years. He visited many light industrial factories, universities and cultural and service establishments in the city in order to bring about a new turn.
					
					 He courteously proposed the election of Kim Jong Il as a delegate to the conference of the WPK, reflecting the unanimous wishes of all the party members and other people in the city. 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting unanimously supported and approved the proposal.
					
					 A decision on electing Kim Jong Il as a delegate to the conference of the WPK was adopted at the meeting with a unanimous approval.
					
					 The meeting elected delegates to the conference of the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK Affected by Typhoon
articles.content:
DPRK Affected by Typhoon
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Many areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have been struck by torrential rains and windstorms in consequence of Typhoon No. 7 moving towards the East Korean Bay from the northeastern sea of the Philippines.
					 Thaetan County had a rainfall as much as 74mm from 20:00 to 21:00 on Wednesday, Suan County 65mm from 21:00 to 24:00, Sungho County 55mm and Sinwon County 53mm from 00:00 to 03:00 on Thursday, Kowon County 36mm from 04:00 to 05:00, and Mangyongdae and Samsok districts, Pyongyang, 80mm and 65mm respectively from 03:00 to 06:00.
					
					 From 06:00 Wednesday to 06:00 Thursday Wonsan had 167mm, Pongchon County 165mm, Thongchon County 162mm, Sinchon County 154mm, Songrim City 152mm, and Hwangju and Anbyon counties 151mm. Some 20 areas were visited by more than 80mm in the same period. 
					
					 Meanwhile, some areas of Kangwon and South Hamgyong provinces and most areas of South Hwanghae Province were lashed by strong winds 10-18 meters per second.

articles.title: Vietnamese Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Vietnamese Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Le Van Cu arranged a reception on Thursday on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
					Present there on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					The ambassador said in his speech that the Vietnamese party, government and people extend sincere thanks to the party, the government and people of the DPRK for supporting the Vietnamese people in their national liberation struggle and construction work.
					
					He extended warm congratulations to the Korean people waging a dynamic drive to greet the 62nd anniversary of the foundation of the DPRK, the 65th anniversary of the founding of the WPK and the conference of the WPK with shining labor achievements.
					
					Pak Ui Chun said in his speech that the historic Pyongyang meeting between General Secretary Kim Jong Il and General Secretary Nong Duc Manh in October 2007 marked a landmark event in developing the relations between the two countries on a new higher phase.
					
					The DPRK government will always set store by the friendly and cooperative relations with Vietnam and make positive efforts to boost them in all fields of politics, economy and culture, he noted.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Fruit Farm
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Fruit Farm
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm on Thursday on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 After being briefed on the mammoth promising orchard, they commanded a bird's-eye view of the farm.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Grave of Kim Po Hyon
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the grave of ardent patriot Kim Po Hyon in Mangyongdae on Thursday on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of his demise.
					 Seen there was a wreath from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop and officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Placed before the grave were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, revolutionary schools, educational institutions and party and power organs, farms and others in the city.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Po Hyon, who made his family members embark on the road of the revolutionary struggle and devoted his all to the country and the people, looking back on his noble life.

articles.title: Friendship between DPRK-Chinese Schools Observed
articles.content:
Friendship between DPRK-Chinese Schools Observed
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of calligraphic and art works opened with due ceremony at Kim Song Ju Primary School on Thursday to mark the first anniversary of the friendly relations between the school of the DPRK and Experimental Primary School in Fusong County of China.
					 Present there were Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, officials concerned and teachers and pupils of the school. 
					
					 Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy here were on hand. 
					
					 The participants laid bunches of flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the school and made bows to him. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The participants looked round the works on display.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the ambassador and staff members of the embassy went round the educational facilities, being briefed on the history of the school associated with leadership exploits of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: National Martial Art Championships Close
articles.content:
National Martial Art Championships Close
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The 5th National Martial Art Championships for September 10 Prize closed with due ceremony at the Taekwon-Do Hall Thursday.
					At the championships opened from Aug. 25 which brought together 14 units including the Pyongyang City and provincial Taekwon-do teams, the Pyongyang City Taekwon-do Team came first in total as it registered high records in several events.
					
					Present there were Chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee Hwang Pong Yong, Minister of Urban Management Hwang Hak Won, officials concerned, players and school youth and children.
					
					Hwang Pong Yong made a closing address.

articles.title: Doctorate Conferred on Korean in China
articles.content:
Doctorate Conferred on Korean in China
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A DPRK doctorate of economics was conferred on a Korean in China Li Chunri.
					 He explained and proved the validity and great vitality of the line of economic construction in the era of Songun on a scientific and theoretical basis.
					
					 The conferring ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Modern Electronic Devices Introduced in Power Sector
articles.content:
Modern Electronic Devices Introduced in Power Sector
						
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Up-to-date electronic devices have been used for electricity production, utility and saving in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Among them are uniquely designed high and low-voltage frequency inverters and switchgears, CVCF (constant voltage and constant frequency), uninterrupted power supply, automatic voltage regulator and automatic power-factor compensator. 
					
					 The high-tension frequency converter has a wide range of speed control and high efficiency. It is also good in output waveform and low in input current harmonics. 
					
					The high-tension switchboard equipped with a latest-type vacuum breaker which can be installed or removed in seconds and interrupts more than 20,000 accidents.   
					
					Advanced control technology for reactive power compensation is applied to the automatic power-factor compensator.
					
					 The devices have already been introduced in many industrial establishments over the past year to prove efficient in stabilizing the electric power system and making an effective use of electricity.

articles.title: Masters of Koryo Celadon
articles.content:
Masters of Koryo Celadon
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- U Chi Son and Im Sa Jun were masters of Koryo celadon in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. They, crowned with Kim Il Sung Prize and the title of People's Artist, made a great contribution to reviving the world-famous Koryo celadon and putting the ceramic technique of Korea on a higher level.
					 U Chi Son was born of a peasant family in Kangnam County, North Hwanghae Province in November 1919 and died in November 2003. He began making ceramics in his childhood and became a professional ceramist after the liberation of the country on August 15, 1945.
					
					 His typical ceramics are chrysanthemum-patterned celadon pot (1964), sunflower-inlaid flower vase (1978), flower vase patterned with scenery of Pyongyang (1980), gourd-shaped kettle patterned with clouds and cranes (1988) and dinner set patterned with clouds and cranes (1997).
					
					 His makings are recognized as priceless treasures in China, Japan and other countries for their sedate and beautiful colors, refined shapes and unique decorations.
					
					 Im Sa Jun (August 1921-April 2007) had engaged himself in ceramics from the age of fourteen.
					
					 His masterpieces are cinnabar small bowl (1960), grape-patterned flower vase (1972), flower vase patterned with reeds and ducks (1984) and dinner-set patterned with pine tree and crane (1997). They, with strong frames and varied patterns, give emotional feelings.
					
					They worked with the Porcelain Creative Group of the Mansudae Art Studio under the care of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: New Slogan Reflecting Spirit of DPRK
articles.content:
New Slogan Reflecting Spirit of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The North Phyongan Provincial Tideland Reclamation Complex has obtained arable land as large as a county by building dykes extending nearly 14 kilometers from Tasa Islet in Yomju County to Cholsan peninsula through Taedasa, Kacha, Soyondong and Taegye islets and constructing networks of facilities. 
					 The tideland reclamation, a monumental project of the Workers' Party era, has been carried out by its workers' heroic effort, indomitable spirit of self-sacrifice, clever conception and unique methods of construction.
					
					When visiting the reclaimed tideland, General Secretary Kim Jong Il said that the slogan "When the Party is determined, we can do anything!" had come from the Korean People's Army before but now an excellent slogan of the Party "When determined, Korea can do anything!" has come from the tideland reclamation project.
					
					 Reflected in the new slogan are the splendid features of the DPRK ever developing under the Songun politics and the strong will of the army and people to build a thriving nation without fail.
					
					 The successful construction of the dykes mirrors the DPRK deciding anything out of its own belief and acting up to its resolution.
					
					 In the country Juche-based vinalon and fertilizer production processes have been built in the wake of the completion of the Juche-based steel production system and modernly-equipped foodstuff factories such as the Samilpho Specialties Factory have appeared throughout the country. And a vast apple orchard has come into being in Wonhung.
					
					 The dam project of the large-sized Kumyagang Army-people Power Station and the construction of Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No.2 have been completed.
					
					 The great changes which have been brought about in the country show that the army and people have strength enough to do anything when they are determined.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Recent China Visit Hailed
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Recent China Visit Hailed 
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's recent visit to China marked a landmark event of weighty significance in boosting the DPRK-China friendship with long historical roots and good tradition.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in an editorial.
					
					 The editorial notes that through the China visit he further deepened the friendly relations between the top leaders of the two parties and countries and injected fresh vitality into the DPRK-China relations in the new century aspiring after steady development. He, at the same time, showed a good example in developing the friendly relations among the countries desirous of unity and cooperation under the banner of independence and made a great contribution to safeguarding the peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and advancing the cause of socialism.
					
					 His China visit greatly pleases and encourages the two peoples as it is a landmark event giving powerful impetus to the sacred struggle of the parties and peoples of the two countries for socialist construction and national reunification, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK-China friendship is a valuable common treasure of the two peoples and unbreakable friendship having eternal vitality. 
					
					 Leaping progress is being made in socialist China to provide a guarantee for the prosperity of the country. The Korean people are rejoiced over the daily change of the appearance of China and the great achievements made in all fields as over their own and extend firm support and solidarity to the socialist cause of the Chinese people.
					
					 The party, government and people of China are extending unreserved support and encouragement to the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation. The Korean people are thankful for this.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people will as ever make positive efforts to boost the friendly ties between the two counties which stood the test of history.
					
					 The immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed by paying the historic visit to China, representing the desire of the two peoples to develop the traditional relations of the DPRK-China friendship as required by the new century, will shine long in the history of the DPRK-China friendship.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Combined Anti-Submarine Drill to Be Staged
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Combined Anti-Submarine Drill to Be Staged
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff announced that a combined anti-submarine drill would be staged in the West Sea of Korea together with U.S. forces from September 5 to 9, according to CBS of south Korea on August 31.
					 Defying the protest and denunciation by all the Koreans and the peace-loving people of the world, the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers are contemplating staging the war maneuvers to spark off another war of aggression in the Korean Peninsula at any cost under the pretext of the fabricated case of the sunken warship, driving the situation to the worst phase.

articles.title: Japan's Settlement of Its Past Crimes Urged in Japan
articles.content:
Japan's Settlement of Its Past Crimes Urged in Japan
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A 2010 East Japan Meeting on History of Korean Residents in Japan and Month of Human Rights was held in Yokohama on August 29.
					 It was attended by Koreans in Japan and personages of Japanese organizations of Japan-Korea friendship and solidarity, trade unions, civic and peace movement organizations and citizens.
					
					 Terumi Terao, co-representative of the Central Headquarters of the Japanese Side to the Fact-Finding Group for the Probe into the Truth about the Forcible Drafting of Koreans, made a speech at the meeting.
					
					 He said that human rights abuses against Koreans are getting serious in Japan as the days go by, adding that if Koreans in Japan are to be guaranteed human rights, the Japanese government should settle its past crimes and opt for the normalization of the relations with the DPRK as early as possible in the spirit of the Japan-DPRK Pyongyang Declaration.
					
					 Then the floor was taken by a representative of the Kanagawa Prefectural Society of Mothers of Korean Schools.
					
					 She branded the attempt of the Japanese authorities to exclude the Korean schools only from the tuition aid program for senior high schools as an intolerable human rights abuse as it fosters the national discrimination and an act of depriving Korean children in Japan of the right to learning.
					
					 Koichi Ishizaka, associate professor at Rikkyo University, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 He pointed out that the Japanese prime minister did not mention any apology and reparation for the past crimes committed during Japan's colonial rule over Korea in his statement released on the occasion of the lapse of a century since the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty".
					
					 For the normalization of the Japan-DPRK relations the Japanese government should, to begin with, take sincere approach towards making apology and reparation for the past crimes.
					
					 An appeal was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Missions in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Missions in Foreign Countries
						
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Union Solidarity and Development, Union of Myanmar led by the administrative director of the party visited the DPRK embassy in Myanmar on August 25 in congratulation of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Foreign figures also paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries on August 24 and 25.
					
					 Among them were the secretary general of the Yangon City Development Committee, who was authorized by Aung Thein Lynn, mayor of Yangon City of Myanmar who doubles as chairman of the committee, Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, Chairman Dolgachev, Vice-Chairman Astakhov and other members of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of the Songun Policy and the Juche Idea of Russia.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the full-length painting of the peerlessly great men standing together and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Make Apology and Reparation to DPRK
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Make Apology and Reparation to DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on August 26 in support of the statement made by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry as regards the lapse of one century since the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty".
					 The statement expressed full support for the DPRK Foreign Ministry's statement demanding that Japan make early apology and reparation to the DPRK.
					
					 Recalling that the Korean people suffered tremendous damage and pain from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, the statement said that it is quite natural for Japan to make apology and reparation to the DPRK though belatedly.
					
					 Japan should also stop the crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, a legitimate organization, and put an immediate halt to its sanctions against the DPRK and the scheme to grab Tok Islets, it held.
					
					 The statement said that the branch fully supports the Korean people in the struggle against Japan's anti-DPRK moves.

articles.title: New Branch of British Juche Idea Study Organization Inaugurated
articles.content:
New Branch of British Juche Idea Study Organization Inaugurated
 Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Stoke-on-Trent Branch of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea was formed on August 21 with the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership as an occasion.
					 Shawn Pikford, secretary general of the group, was elected chief of the branch.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars, friendly gatherings, photo exhibitions and film shows took place in South Africa, Bangladesh, Uganda and Ethiopia in the period from August 18 to 24 to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Displayed in their venues were photos showing the Songun leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched "Korea Shinning with Time-honored History", "Reply of Korea" and other Korean films.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, said at a meeting that Kim Jong Il has turned the DPRK into a socialist stronghold while smashing the constant anti-DPRK moves of the imperialists with the powerful military deterrent.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics the Korean people are working world-startling miracles in the drive to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation till 2012, he stressed.
					
					 M. Gamrul Huda, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, and other speakers referred to the fact that the DPRK has demonstrated itself as a socialist power, resolutely foiling the imperialists' moves for aggression and war with its treasured sword of Songun under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 S. N. Sserwanga, secretary general of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, said at a friendly gathering that the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il ushered in a new era in which the DPRK is prospering as a strong socialist state. The DPRK guided by the great leader will as ever prosper, he added.

articles.title: Wen Jiabao desea el exito de la Conferencia del PTC
articles.content:
Wen Jiabao desea el exito de la Conferencia del PTC
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ATCC) -- La reciente visita del Dirigente Kim Jong Il a China es un evento trascendental de mucha importancia para fortalecer y desarrollar mas la amistad Corea-China que tiene larga historia y magnifica tradicion.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en su editorial difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					A traves de su reciente visita a China, el Dirigente        ensancho la amistad entre los maximos dirigentes de dos partidos y dos paises e inyecto la nueva vitalidad en las relaciones bilaterales del nuevo siglo que aspiran al desarrollo constante. Sento el ejemplo de como desarrollar bajo la bandera de independencia las relaciones de amistad entre los paises aspirantes a la unidad y la cooperacion e hizo gran contribucion a la defensa de la paz y la estabilidad del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo y al avance de la causa socialista.
					
					Esa visita alegro y estimulo mucho a los pueblos de los dos paises porque dio buen impulso a la sagrada lucha de dos partidos y dos pueblos por la construccion socialista y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La amistad Corea-China es la valiosa riqueza comun de ambos paises y la inquebrantable y eternamente vital.
					
					Hoy dia, en la China socialista se logra un gran desarrollo que garantiza la prosperidad del pais. 
					
					El pueblo coreano ve con mucho placer la realidad de China, que se trasforma cada dia mas y logra grandes exitos en todos los sectores, considerandola como la propia y envia su firme apoyo y solidaridad a la causa socialista del pueblo chino.
					
					El partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de China tambien envian su apoyo y respaldo irrestrictos a la lucha del pueblo coreano por construir una gran potencia prospera socialista, de lo cual este esta muy agradecido.
					
					El Partido del Trabajo y el pueblo de Corea seguiran esforzandose por fortalecer mas los lazos de amistad Corea-China que han superado todas las pruebas de la historia.
					
					Brillaran eternamente en los anales de la amistad Corea-China las inmortales hazanas alcanzadas por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en su historica visita a China realizada partiendo del anhelo de los pueblos coreano y chino de desarrollar a la altura del nuevo siglo las tradicionales relaciones de amistad bilateral.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion de delegados del partido de la ciudad de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion de delegados del partido de la ciudad de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el 28 de agosto en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion de los delegados del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de la ciudad de Pyongyang, reporto hoy el diario Rodong Sinmun.
					En la ocasion participaron los delegados elegidos en las organizaciones urbanas y municipales del partido, las del partido de distintas unidades a todos los niveles y las de los organos de nivel central y urbano.
					
					En la reunion se debatio el problema de elegir a los delegados a la Conferencia del PTC.
					
					Myong Son Yong, secretario del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang y delegado de la organizacion partidista del municipio de Jung, subrayo en su discurso de propuesta que brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria las proezas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien convirtio la patria, que hace un siglo se vio obligada a ser avasallada por su debilidad militar, en una potencia militar socialista que ningun enemigo se atreve a atacar, y dio la garantia militar de la prosperidad de todas las generaciones venideras.
					
					Agrego que en los periodos mas duros que nunca conocidos como la marcha penosa y la forzada, el Dirigente dio inicio a la gran causa de construir una gran potencia prospera y escribio la epopeya de abnegacion patriotica recorriendo incansablemente todas partes del pais con su ferrea voluntad de hacer del pueblo coreano el envidiable para todo el mundo.
					
					Apunto que en los ultimos anos, el Dirigente presento uno tras otro los ambiciosos proyectos para acondicionar mejor la ciudad de Pyongyang y mejorar la vida del pueblo y tomo reiteradamente las medidas de beneficios populares.
					
					Ademas, visito incesantemente numerosas fabricas de industria ligera, universidades y organos culturales y servicios publicos de esta capital para que se produjera un nuevo viraje, afirmo.
					
					El orador propuso cortesmente elegir al Dirigente como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC, en reflejo del unanime deseo de todos los militantes del partido y otros habitantes de la ciudad.
					
					Esta propuesta fue apoyada y aprobada totalmente por los que usaron la palabra seguidamente.
					
					Luego, fue aprobada por unanimidad la resolucion correspondiente.
					
					A continuacion, fueron electos otros delegados.

articles.title: Pasa por Corea el tifon No. 7
articles.content:
Pasa por Corea el tifon No. 7
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Como efectos del tifon No.7 que surgio en el mar noreste de Filipinas y se traslada al golfo de Corea oriental, cayo tremendo aguacero e hizo un viento muy fuerte en varias localidades de Corea.
					Abajo se citan las cantidades de precipitaciones y el horario por localidades:
					
					El distrito de Thaethan - 74 mm entre las horas 20 y 21 de ayer; el distrito de Suan - 65mm entre 21 y 24; el distrito de Sungho-55mm y el distrito de Sinwon-53mm entre 0 y 3 de hoy; el distrito de Kowon-36mm entre 4 y 5 de hoy; los municipios de Mangyongdae y Samsok de la ciudad de Pyongyang - 80mm y 65mm entre 3 y 6 de hoy, respectivamente.
					
					Entre las 6 de ayer y las 6 de hoy, cayeron 167mm, 165mm, 162mm, 154mm, 152mm, en la ciudad de Wonsan, los distritos de Pongchon, Thongchon, Sinchon, la ciudad de Songrim, por este orden, y 151mm en los distritos de Hwangju y Anbyon, asi como mas de 80-100mm en mas de 20 regiones.
					
					Ademas, soplo un fuerte viento de 10-18m por segundo en algunas zonas de las provincias de Kangwon y Hamgyong del Sur y en la mayoria de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun felicita la visita de Kim Jong Il a China
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun felicita la visita de Kim Jong Il a China
						
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ATCC) -- La reciente visita del Dirigente Kim Jong Il a China es un evento trascendental de mucha importancia para fortalecer y desarrollar mas la amistad Corea-China que tiene larga historia y magnifica tradicion.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en su editorial difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					A traves de su reciente visita a China, el Dirigente        ensancho la amistad entre los maximos dirigentes de dos partidos y dos paises e inyecto la nueva vitalidad en las relaciones bilaterales del nuevo siglo que aspiran al desarrollo constante. Sento el ejemplo de como desarrollar bajo la bandera de independencia las relaciones de amistad entre los paises aspirantes a la unidad y la cooperacion e hizo gran contribucion a la defensa de la paz y la estabilidad del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo y al avance de la causa socialista.
					
					Esa visita alegro y estimulo mucho a los pueblos de los dos paises porque dio buen impulso a la sagrada lucha de dos partidos y dos pueblos por la construccion socialista y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La amistad Corea-China es la valiosa riqueza comun de ambos paises y la inquebrantable y eternamente vital.
					
					Hoy dia, en la China socialista se logra un gran desarrollo que garantiza la prosperidad del pais. 
					
					El pueblo coreano ve con mucho placer la realidad de China, que se trasforma cada dia mas y logra grandes exitos en todos los sectores, considerandola como la propia y envia su firme apoyo y solidaridad a la causa socialista del pueblo chino.
					
					El partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de China tambien envian su apoyo y respaldo irrestrictos a la lucha del pueblo coreano por construir una gran potencia prospera socialista, de lo cual este esta muy agradecido.
					
					El Partido del Trabajo y el pueblo de Corea seguiran esforzandose por fortalecer mas los lazos de amistad Corea-China que han superado todas las pruebas de la historia.
					
					Brillaran eternamente en los anales de la amistad Corea-China las inmortales hazanas alcanzadas por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en su historica visita a China realizada partiendo del anhelo de los pueblos coreano y chino de desarrollar a la altura del nuevo siglo las tradicionales relaciones de amistad bilateral.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por efemerides significativas
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por efemerides significativas
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 50o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre Corea y Cuba y del 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el embajador cubano en Corea, Jose Manuel Galego Montano, ofrecio el dia primero un banquete en su sede diplomatica.
					A la recepcion fueron invitados el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, el ministro de Comercio Exterior, Ri Ryong Nam, el presidente del Comite de Educacion y del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, Kim Yong Jin, la presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk, y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					El embajador cubano senalo en su discurso que las relaciones de amistad entre Cuba y Corea fueron preparadas por el companero Fidel Castro Ruz y el Presidente Kim Il Sung y subrayo que los dos paises vinieron apoyando y cooperando mutuamente en la lucha conjunta por defender la independencia, la soberania y el socialismo.
					
					Destaco que las especiales relaciones de amistad Cuba-Corea se fortalecen y se desarrollan cada dia mas bajo la profunda atencion del Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, Raul Castro Ruz, y el Dirigente            Kim Jong Il, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Afirmo que el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba enviaran invariable apoyo y solidaridad al partido, el gobierno y el pueblo hermanos de Corea y deseo que el pueblo coreano alcance todas metas presentadas.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop dijo en su discurso que los dos paises vinieron fortaleciendo y desarrollando constantemente los lazos de amistad en la lucha conjunta por defender el socialismo.
					
					El pueblo coreano esta contento de numerosos exitos, que logra el hermano pueblo cubano en la lucha por defender la soberania del pais, considerandolos como los propios, apunto.
					
					Subrayo que Corea se esforzara activamente por fortalecer la amistad y la solidaridad combativas entre ambos paises, forjadas por el Presidente     Kim Il Sung y el companero Fidel Castro Ruz y estan bajo la profunda atencion del Dirigente       Kim Jong Il y el companero Raul Castro Ruz.
